Dragonfly/Scorpyo::

"Well if you like that"replied Dragonfly, a big scorpion appeared 
from darkess, it was Scorpyo... a dangerous and insane bot as sson as 
Dragonfly saw him he said "Scorpyo, he's Crater... he's one of our 
troop so you can't hurt him, do you understand"

"NO hurt... " roared Scorpyo and moved to dark corner.

"He understood" Told Dragonfly to Crater "Well I'll right back"

Dragonfly ran towards Armoury.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Crater::
> 
> Crater shrugs. "I'll wait for you here, I guess."
